Certificate Requirements: Minimum grade of 'C' in courses applied to certificate
A maximum of one course used to meet the Philosophy, B.A. requirements in Logic, Ethics, Metaphysics/Epistemology, and History can be used to meet a certificate's requirements.
A maximum of one course used to meet the Philosophy Minor History of Philosophy requirement can be used to meet a certificate's requirements.
A course meeting one set of certificate requirements cannot be used to meet another set of certificate requirements.
Foundation Course (3 credits): Complete one 100 or 200 level philosophy course to meet philosophy upper division course prerequisites
